All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddUserService
Handles the creation and registration of new users in the system.
AdminBroadcastMessageData
Holds data for an admin broadcast message.
AdminBroadcastMessageFormater
Formats HTML email messages for admin broadcasts sent to users.
AdminBroadcastNotifier
Handles admin broadcast messages to all regular users.
AdminController
Controller for the admin dashboard.
AllCdService
Service for retrieving all CDs from the repository.
AmountValidator
Utility validator for parsing and validating monetary amounts.
AppConfig
Main Spring Boot configuration class.
ApplicationContextProvider
Provides static access to the Spring ApplicationContext.
BCryptHashingPassword
Provides password hashing and verification using the BCrypt algorithm.
Book
Represents a book item in the library.
BookFineStrategy
Fine calculation strategy for overdue books.
BookRepository
Repository for managing Book entities.
BookSearchByAuthorStrategy
Search strategy for finding books by author name.
BookSearchByIsbnStrategy
Search strategy for finding books by ISBN.
BookSearchByTitleStrategy
Search strategy for finding books by title.
BookSearchService
Service that delegates book search requests to the selected strategy.
BooksService
Service for general book-related operations.
BorrowDueDurationCalculator
Utility class for calculating the borrowing duration of media items.
BorrowService
Handles the borrowing process for media items.
BorrowValidator
Validates whether a user is eligible to borrow an item.
CalculateFineService
Calculates and applies fines for users with overdue borrowed items.
Cd
Represents a CD item in the library.
CdCountService
Service for counting CDs in the system.
CDFineStrategy
Fine calculation strategy for overdue CDs.
CdRepository
Repository for managing Cd entities.
CdSearchByTitleStrategy
Search strategy for finding CDs by title.
CdSearchService
Service that delegates CD search operations to the selected strategy.
CurrentLocalDateTimeResolver
Provides the current local date and time.
DateCalculator
Utility class for basic date and time calculations.
EmailAdminBroadcastNotificationSender
Sends admin broadcast messages via email.
EmailOverdueBorrowNotificationSender
Sends overdue borrow notifications to users via email.
EmailPaymentConfirmationSender
Sends payment confirmation emails to users.
EmailService
Handles sending emails using SMTP (Gmail).
FineHistory
Stores user fine history records.
FineHistoryReportController
Controller for displaying a user's fine history in a table view.
FineHistoryRepository
Repository for managing FineHistory records.
FineResolver
Utility class for resolving fine amounts based on MediaItem type.
FineService
Handles fine calculation, application, and payment operations for users.
FineStrategy
Defines a strategy for calculating fines for overdue items.
FineThreadService
Scheduled background service that periodically calculates and applies overdue fines.
FxmlNavigator
Handles navigation between different FXML views in the application.
GeneralOverdueBorrowMessageFormater
Formats HTML email messages notifying users of overdue borrowed items.
GetAllUsersService
Service for retrieving all users from the database.
GetUserBalanceService
Service for retrieving a user's fine balance.
IBookSearchStrategy<TValue>
Defines a strategy for searching books using different criteria.
ICdSearchStrategy<TValue>
Defines a strategy for searching CDs using different criteria.
ICurrentLocalTimeDateResolver
Provides an abstraction for obtaining the current local date and time.
IHashingPassword
Defines the contract for password hashing and verification.
IMessageFormater<IMessageObj>
Defines a generic contract for converting message data objects into formatted output.
INotificationSender<TUser,TMessage>
Generic interface for sending notifications to users.
IOverdueBorrowValidation
Used to check if a user has overdue borrowed items.
ISessionManager
Abstraction for managing the lifecycle of a user session.
ItemNotBorrowedByUserException
 
LibrarianController
Controller for the librarian dashboard.
LocalSessionManager
Simple in-memory session manager that stores the current user in a local field.
LoginController
Controller for handling the login screen.
LoginCredentialsValidator
Validates login credentials for authentication.
LoginService
Handles user authentication and session initialization.
LogoutService
Handles terminating the current user session.
Main
Main entry point for the JavaFX + Spring Boot application.
MediaItem
Base class for all media items in the library (e.g., books, CDs).
MediaItemRepository
Repository for managing MediaItem entities.
MediaItemSearchService
Provides unified search functionality across all media item types (books and CDs) using different search strategies.
MediaItemService
Service for managing media items in the system.
MediaItemType
Types of media items available in the library.
NotImplementedException
 
OverdueBorrowedItem
Represents a borrowed media item that is overdue.
OverdueBorrowedItemsData
Holds information about a user and their list of overdue borrowed items.
OverdueBorrowNotifier
Handles sending notifications to users with overdue borrowed items.
OverDueCountService
Service for counting overdue borrowed media items.
OverdueItemDetector
Detects users who have overdue borrowed media items.
OverdueItemsException
 
PaymentConfirmationData
Holds information about a user's payment confirmation details.
PaymentConfirmationMessageFormater
Formats payment confirmation data into an HTML email body.
ReturnItemService
Handles the process of returning borrowed media items.
RoleToFxmlMapper
Maps user roles to their corresponding FXML view files.
SpringFXMLLoader
Utility class that integrates Spring's ApplicationContext with JavaFX's FXMLLoader.
StandardOverdueBorrowValidator
Default validator that checks if a user has overdue borrowed items.
UnregisterUserService
Service for handling user unregistration.
User
Represents a library user with account, role, and fine details.
UserBorrowedItemsService
Service for managing and analyzing a user's borrowed media items.
UserContactDTO
Simple DTO for transferring basic user contact info (id, name, email).
UserController
Controller for the user dashboard.
UserCountService
Service for counting users based on their assigned roles.
UserCredentialsDTO
DTO for user login credentials (email and password).
UserRepository
Repository for managing User entities.
UserRole
Defines roles for users in the system.
